name: Train Simulator & Maker Game
description:
>> Train Maker is the perfect metal construction app for all gamers ages 3 to 103!
>> In Train Maker you have to prove yourself as an accomplished master train builder!
>> Professionally designed and brilliantly created train making app! Great for all who enjoy train crafting!!

Build your train through a simple to use interface that will allow you to build the train of your dreams. Use a variety of different parts to build your ride. Add brakes, smokestacks, wheels, engines, headlights and more. There is no limit to what you can build! Test your train on the test track in a beautiful 2D environment. Use the gas pedal, acceleration and brakes while cruising down the rail. 

The best part is, this game is not just fun, it can also help increase your I.Q. Train Maker can give you a greater sense of spatial-relationships, mechanical understanding, and the physics of machinery.

FEATURES:
- Kid friendly interface
- Amazing learning potential
- Simple and fun train building mechanics
- Build your own trains and test them in the app
- Cool graphics and game animations that totally rock
- A variety of parts to add to your train, beautiful and fun 2D graphics
- Awesome train upgrades to power up make your trains even cooler
- Driving sound effects, simulation of gas pedals, acceleration and brakes
- Fantastic in game test track to push your trains to the limits of your engineering skills

You don’t have to be an auto maker to build trains, just this app!
